testConnection.description: Test if GraphQL endpoint is working

testPatientMinimal.description: Test patient query with minimal fields to check for null handling
testPatientMinimal.query: query TestPatientByMrn($mrn: String!, $system: String) { patientByMrn(mrn: $mrn, system: $system) { patient { id resourceType } } }

testPatientBasic.description: Test patient query with basic fields
testPatientBasic.query: query MinimalPatientData($mrn: String!, $system: String) { patientByMrn(mrn: $mrn, system: $system) { patient { id resourceType lastUpdated } encounters { id resourceType } conditions { id resourceType } } }

testPatientNotFound.description: Test query with non-existent MRN (should return null gracefully)
testPatientNotFound.query: query TestPatientByMrn($mrn: String!, $system: String) { patientByMrn(mrn: $mrn, system: $system) { patient { id resourceType } } }

testPatientWithoutSystem.description: Test patient query without system parameter
testPatientWithoutSystem.query: query TestPatientByMrn($mrn: String!) { patientByMrn(mrn: $mrn) { patient { id resourceType } } }

comprehensivePatientQuery.description: Full comprehensive query with null handling
comprehensivePatientQuery.query: query GetPatientByMrn($mrn: String!, $system: String) { patientByMrn(mrn: $mrn, system: $system) { patient { id resourceType versionId resource lastUpdated txid } encounters { id resourceType versionId resource lastUpdated txid } conditions { id resourceType versionId resource lastUpdated txid } observations { id resourceType versionId resource lastUpdated txid } allergies { id resourceType versionId resource lastUpdated txid } medications { id resourceType versionId resource lastUpdated txid } procedures { id resourceType versionId resource lastUpdated txid } familyHistory { id resourceType versionId resource lastUpdated txid } diagnosticReports { id resourceType versionId resource lastUpdated txid } medicationRequests { id resourceType versionId resource lastUpdated txid } serviceRequests { id resourceType versionId resource lastUpdated txid } appointments { id resourceType versionId resource lastUpdated txid } compositions { id resourceType versionId resource lastUpdated txid } } }
